entry.string: Your PHP configuration does not seem to include the required CURL extension. Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.curl.php on how to install it.
entry.translation: Yuoor PHP cunffeegooreshun dues nut seem tu incloode-a zee reqooured COoRL ixtenseeun. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a reffer tu Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.curl.php oon hoo tu instell it. Um de hur de hur de hur.
